_symbol_format: .TICKER YYMMDD P/C STRIKE  (positive qty = buy, negative = sell)
_source: Ravish passive strategies playbook - Super Risk Reversal (custom combo)
notes: NVDA super risk reversal: sell 160P + buy 200C/220C bull call spread, Jan 2027. Put credit funds the call spread. Bullish with downside cushion.
rationale: Sell long-term put to fund ATM/OTM bull call spread. Synthetic long exposure with defined risk. Combines income (short put) with upside participation (call spread). Like SOFI example: sell 25 put, buy 30C/35C.

entry_conditions.iv_environment: Works in any IV — put credit funds the call spread. Higher IV = better put credit.

put_leg.note: Sell OTM put, 15-25 delta. Far enough for safety. Credit collected funds the call spread.

call_spread.long_call: ATM or slightly OTM (200 strike for NVDA at 191)
call_spread.short_call: Further OTM (220 strike), caps upside but reduces cost
call_spread.note: Bull call spread: buy lower strike call, sell higher strike call. Width determines max profit.

stock_criteria.note: Must have bullish conviction — this is directional. Individual top stocks only, not indices.

entry_conditions.position_sizing: Risk = put assignment amount - call spread value. Margin: put margin + call spread debit.
entry_conditions.notes: Super Risk Reversal: sell long-term put (15-25 delta) + buy ATM/OTM bull call spread. Put credit funds the call. Example: NVDA at 191 — sell 160P, buy 200C, sell 220C. Example: SOFI at 30 — sell 25P, buy 30C, sell 35C. Net debit should be minimal or zero-cost.

pnl_drivers.max_profit: Call spread width - net debit. For 200/220 spread: $2,000 - net debit.
pnl_drivers.max_loss: Put strike x 100 - put credit + call spread debit (if stock crashes below put strike). Realistic: breakeven ~15-25% below current.
pnl_drivers.primary_driver: Stock appreciation — long call spread profits from upside move
pnl_drivers.secondary_driver: Put credit — short put theta decay generates income that offsets call spread cost
pnl_drivers.tertiary_driver: Time value — if stock stays flat, short put decays to zero while call spread loses time value (partially offset)

greeks_profile.theta: mixed — short put positive theta, long call spread negative theta. Net depends on strikes.
greeks_profile.vega: mixed — short put negative vega, long call positive vega. Net slightly long vega (bullish vol).
greeks_profile.delta: positive — synthetic long exposure. Short put + long call spread = bullish.
greeks_profile.gamma: slightly positive — call spread has positive gamma near ATM strikes

exit_rules.profit_target: 50% of max call spread profit, or close put side when 80% decayed
exit_rules.stop_loss: If stock breaks below put strike, reassess fundamentals. Close if thesis broken.
exit_rules.management: Can close legs independently. If stock rallies, close call spread for profit. If flat, let put decay.

pnl_drivers.ideal_scenario: NVDA rises from 191 to 220+ over 6-12 months. Call spread reaches max profit ($2,000). Short put expires worthless. Total profit = call spread max + put credit.
